mapper.select: SELECT Project1.ASSET_D_ID ASSET_D_ID, Project1.ASSET_ID ASSET_ID, Project1.BRAND_ID BRAND_ID, Project1.NAME1 NAME, Project1.NAME NAME1, Project1.ASSET_D_REM ASSET_D_REM, Project1.STUS_ID STUS_ID, Project1.NAME2 NAME2, Project1.TYPE_ID TYPE_ID, Project1.CODE_NAME CODE_NAME, Project1.UPD_DT UPD_DT, Project1.UPD_USER_ID UPD_USER_ID, Project1.USER_NAME USER_NAME, Project1.NAME3 NAME3, Project1.VALU VALU, Project1.ASSET_D_ITM_REM ASSET_D_ITM_REM, Project1.ASSET_D_ITM_ID ASSET_D_ITM_ID FROM ( SELECT Extent1.ASSET_D_ID ASSET_D_ID, Extent1.STUS_ID STUS_ID, Extent1.ASSET_ID ASSET_ID, Extent1.TYPE_ID TYPE_ID, Extent1.BRAND_ID BRAND_ID, Extent1.UPD_USER_ID UPD_USER_ID, Extent1.UPD_DT UPD_DT, Extent1.NAME NAME, Extent1.ASSET_D_REM ASSET_D_REM, Extent2.CODE_NAME CODE_NAME, Extent3.NAME NAME1, Extent4.NAME NAME2, (select user_name from SYS0047M where USER_ID = Extent1.UPD_USER_ID) USER_NAME, Extent6.NAME AS NAME3, Extent6.VALU AS VALU, Extent6.ASSET_D_ITM_REM, Extent6.ASSET_D_ITM_ID FROM LOG0051D Extent1 INNER JOIN SYS0013M Extent2 ON Extent2.CODE_ID = Extent1.TYPE_ID INNER JOIN LOG0049M Extent3 ON Extent3.BRAND_ID = Extent1.BRAND_ID INNER JOIN SYS0038M Extent4 ON Extent4.STUS_CODE_ID = Extent1.STUS_ID INNER JOIN LOG0052D Extent6 ON Extent6.ASSET_D_ID = Extent1.ASSET_D_ID WHERE ( 1 = Extent1.STUS_ID ) AND ( Extent1.ASSET_ID = #{assetid} ) AND ( 0 = Extent6.DISAB ) ) Project1 ORDER BY Project1.ASSET_D_ID ASC, Project1.ASSET_D_ID ASC

SELECT BRAND_ID CODE_ID , Name CODE_NAME , DISAB DISAB , CRT_USER_ID CRT_USER_ID , CRT_DT CRT_DT , UPD_USER_ID UPD_USER_ID , UPD_DT UPD_DT FROM LOG0049M WHERE 0 = DISAB ORDER BY Name ASC

SELECT Project1.CODE_ID CODE_ID, Project1.CODE_MASTER_ID CODE_MASTER_ID, Project1.CODE_NAME CODE_NAME, Project1.CODE CODE,
Project1.DISAB DISAB, Project1.CRT_DT CRT_DT, Project1.CRT_USER_ID CRT_USER_ID, Project1.UPD_DT AS UPD_DT, Project1.UPD_USER_ID UPD_USER_ID, Project1.OLD_CODE_ID OLD_CODE_ID FROM ( SELECT Extent2.CODE_ID CODE_ID, Extent2.CODE_MASTER_ID CODE_MASTER_ID, Extent2.CODE CODE, Extent2.CODE_NAME CODE_NAME,
Extent2.DISAB DISAB, Extent2.CRT_DT CRT_DT, Extent2.CRT_USER_ID CRT_USER_ID, Extent2.UPD_DT UPD_DT, Extent2.UPD_USER_ID UPD_USER_ID, Extent2.OLD_CODE_ID OLD_CODE_ID FROM SYS0014M Extent1 INNER JOIN SYS0013M Extent2 ON (Extent2.CODE_ID = Extent1.CODE_ID) AND (0 = Extent2.DISAB) WHERE (0 = Extent1.DISAB) AND (Extent1.PARENT_CODE_ID = #{groupCode}) AND (Extent1.HRCHY_TYPE_ID = #{hrchytypeid}) ) Project1 ORDER BY Project1.CODE_NAME ASC
SELECT DEPT_ID CODE_ID , DEPT_NAME CODE_NAME FROM SYS0040M WHERE ( 1 = DEPT_STUS_ID ) AND ( 'tUser' = DEPT_TBL_USE ) AND ( 'fUserDepartmentID' = DEPT_FILD_USE )

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LOG0050M ( ASSET_ID, STUS_ID, CTGRY_ID, TYPE_ID, COLOR_ID, BRAND_ID, CURR_BRNCH_ID, CURR_DEPT_ID, CURR_USER_ID, PURCHS_DT, PURCHS_AMT, IMEI_NO, WRANTY_NO, SERIAL_NO, REF_NO, ASSET_REM, CRT_USER_ID, CRT_DT, UPD_USER_ID, UPD_DT, NAME, MAC_ADDR, INVC_NO, DEALER_ID ) SELECT #{newAssetId}, STUS_ID, CTGRY_ID, TYPE_ID, COLOR_ID, BRAND_ID, 42, 38, 0, PURCHS_DT, PURCHS_AMT, IMEI_NO, WRANTY_NO, SERIAL_NO, REF_NO, ASSET_REM, #{loginId}, SYSDATE, #{loginId}, SYSDATE, NAME, MAC_ADDR, INVC_NO, DEALER_ID FROM LOG0050M WHERE ASSET_ID=#{assetid}

mapper.select: SELECT Project1.CARD_ID CARD_ID , Project1.ASSET_ID ASSET_ID , Project1.BRNCH_ID BRNCH_ID , Project1.C1 C1 , Project1.CARD_DOC_NO CARD_DOC_NO , Project1.CODE_NAME CODE_NAME , Project1.CARD_TYPE_ID CARD_TYPE_ID , Project1.CRT_DT CRT_DT , Project1.CRT_USER_ID CRT_USER_ID , Project1.USER_NAME USER_NAME , Project1.DEPT_ID DEPT_ID , Project1.C2 C2 , Project1.QTY QTY FROM ( SELECT Extent1.CARD_ID CARD_ID , Extent1.CARD_TYPE_ID CARD_TYPE_ID , Extent1.CARD_DOC_NO CARD_DOC_NO , Extent1.ASSET_ID ASSET_ID , Extent1.QTY QTY , Extent1.BRNCH_ID BRNCH_ID , Extent1.DEPT_ID DEPT_ID , Extent1.CRT_USER_ID CRT_USER_ID , TO_CHAR(Extent1.CRT_DT, 'DD/MM/YYYY') CRT_DT , Extent2.CODE_NAME CODE_NAME , Extent3.USER_NAME USER_NAME , CASE WHEN ( Extent4.BRNCH_ID IS NOT NULL ) THEN Extent4.CODE ELSE '' END C1 , CASE WHEN ( Extent5.DEPT_ID IS NOT NULL ) THEN Extent5.DEPT_NAME ELSE '' END C2 FROM LOG0057M Extent1 JOIN SYS0013M Extent2 ON Extent2.CODE_ID = Extent1.CARD_TYPE_ID JOIN SYS0047M Extent3 ON Extent3.USER_ID = Extent1.CRT_USER_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0005M Extent4 ON Extent4.BRNCH_ID = Extent1.BRNCH_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0040M Extent5 ON Extent5.DEPT_ID = Extent1.DEPT_ID WHERE Extent1.ASSET_ID = #{masterassetid} ) Project1 ORDER BY Project1.CARD_ID DESC
